title: Rare Hits of The 80s Vol. 37
description:
The vol. 37 of these compilations consists of a few songs requested here as well as those that did not make it to the past rare hits of the 80s torrents; mostly got kicked out in the last moment. But I realized there are couple of really cool songs among them and deserve posting. Some of the ultra obscure bands that are featured here are Natural Scientist, Shadows As Tall As Trees, Standing Waves, Allez Allez, Whizz For Atoms and Richard Strange. Hope you enjoy it. 


Rare Hits of The 80s Vol. 37

01 Natural Scientist - See Through You
02 Bolland & Bolland - Images
03 Fiction Factory - Everyone But You
04 Breakfast Club - Right On Track
05 Vision - Tears Idle Tears
06 Silent Running - Heartland
07 Geisha - Part Time Love Affair

09 Cutting Crew - (Another one of my) Big Ideas
10 Paradox - One Look
11 Shadows As Tall As Trees - Now Don't Cry
12 Standing Waves - Vertigo
13 Academy - Stranded
14 Music For Pleasure - Fuel To The Fire
15 Thomas Lang - The Happy Man
16 Bone Symphony - Everything I Say is a Lie
17 Zerra One - Ten Thousand Voices
18 Hollywood Beyond - Save Me
19 Strange Advance - Love Becomes Electric
20 Paparazzi - Tell Me
21 Allez Allez - Valley Of The Kings
22 Dugites - Cut the Talking
23 Whizz For Atoms - That Sinking Feeling

25 Bolland & Bolland - Night of The Shooting Stars
26 Mood Six - Hanging Around

28 Vision - Breakdown
29 Box of Toys - Time Takes Me Back
